text: Had several issues with the ASUS ROG GL703GM Gaming Notebook, 17.3" 120 Hz FHD, Intel 6-Core i7-8750H Upto 4.1GHz, 32GB RAM, 2TB SSD, GTX 1060, MiniDP, HDMI, Card Reader, Backlit Keys, Wi-Fi, BT, Windows 10 Pro since day one. performance throttles under load and the fan noise feels cheap. Performance in gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Had several issues with the ASUS ROG GL703GM Gaming Notebook, 17.3" 120 Hz FHD, Intel 6-Core i7-8750H Upto 4.1GHz, 32GB RAM, 2TB SSD, GTX 1060, MiniDP, HDMI, Card Reader, Backlit Keys, Wi-Fi, BT, Windows 10 Pro since day one. performance throttles under load and the trackpad feels cheap. Performance in content creation and gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the ASUS ROG GL703GM Gaming Notebook, 17.3" 120 Hz FHD, Intel 6-Core i7-8750H Upto 4.1GHz, 32GB RAM, 2TB SSD, GTX 1060, MiniDP, HDMI, Card Reader, Backlit Keys, Wi-Fi, BT, Windows 10 Pro. It performance throttles under load frequently when playing Apex Legends, and the performance throttles significantly. The screen brightness has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Avoid the ASUS ROG GL703GM Gaming Notebook, 17.3" 120 Hz FHD, Intel 6-Core i7-8750H Upto 4.1GHz, 32GB RAM, 2TB SSD, GTX 1060, MiniDP, HDMI, Card Reader, Backlit Keys, Wi-Fi, BT, Windows 10 Pro if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. Battery drains incredibly fast, even on light tasks.. Looking to return it.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the ASUS ROG GL703GM Gaming Notebook, 17.3" 120 Hz FHD, Intel 6-Core i7-8750H Upto 4.1GHz, 32GB RAM, 2TB SSD, GTX 1060, MiniDP, HDMI, Card Reader, Backlit Keys, Wi-Fi, BT, Windows 10 Pro. It blue screens occasionally frequently when playing Fortnite, and the performance throttles significantly. The battery life has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.
